itemInfo.itemDesc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Cedar Timber.

item.name: Cedar Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Lumberjackâ€™s Rest Area, Longleaf Tree Forest, Oze Pass. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Cedar Trees.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
